mapper.select: select ir.id , ir.fechainiciorenta , ir.fechafinrenta , i.id as item_id, i.nombre as i_nombre, i.descripcion as i_descripcion, i.fechalanzamiento as i_fechalanzamiento, i.tarifaxdia as i_tarifaxdia, i.formatorenta as i_formatorenta, i.genero as i_genero, ti.id as ti_id, ti.descripcion as ti_descripcion FROM VI_ITEMRENTADO as ir join VI_ITEMS as i on ir.ITEMS_id=i.id left join VI_TIPOITEM as ti on i.TIPOITEM_id=ti.id
